title: 2021 Jackson mayoral election
added: * [[Bernie Sanders]], [[United States Senate|U.S. Senator]] from [[Vermont]] (2007–present); [[United States House of Representatives|U.S. Representative]] from [[Vermont's at-large congressional district|VT-00]] (1991–2007); [[List of mayors of Burlington, Vermont|Mayor]] of [[Burlington, Vermont]] (1981–1989); Chair of the [[United States Senate Committee on the Budget|Senate Budget Committee]] (2021–present); candidate for President in [[2016 Democratic Party presidential primaries|2016]] and [[2020 Democratic Party presidential primaries|2020]]<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.wjtv.com/news/sen-sanders-endorses-mayor-lumumba-for-reelection/|title=Sen. Sanders endorses Mayor Lumumba for reelection|date=March 29, 2021|work=[[WJTV]]|accessdate=March 29, 2021}}</ref> (''[[Independent politician|Independent]]'')
